headline: Is It Too Late To Consider AMETEK (AME) After A 20% One-Year Share Price Gain?
summary: Wondering if AMETEK at around US$210 a share still offers value, or if the easy money has already been made? This article walks through what the current price might be implying. With the stock at US$210.64 and showing returns of 0.7% over the last week, 4.4% over the last month, and 20.4% over the past year, many investors are asking what is baked into the price right now. Recent coverage has focused on how AMETEK fits into the broader capital goods sector and how investors are thinking...
